heroes.ability1_desc: Whenever enemies burning with Arcane Fire take damage from any source, Adagio regenerates 35% of that damage as energy.
heroes.ability2_desc: Adagio heals a target ally and splashes Arcane Fire onto nearby enemies, dealing damage every second. If Adagio heals himself, he'll also slow nearby enemies by 70% for 0.7 seconds. Gift of Fire's burst heal has an 10% bonus health ratio.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Heal/sec: 15/20/25/30/35 (10% Crystal Ratio)
Fire Duration: 5/5.5/6/6.5/7
Fire Damage: 20/30/40/50/70 (20% Crystal Ratio)
Heal Duration: 3/3/3/3/3
Burst Heal: 40/60/80/100/140 (30% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc: Temporarily increases target ally's basic attack power for 6 seconds. Deals additional damage if the target is burning with Arcane Fire, and if Adagio casts this spell on himself.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Number of Attacks: 5/5/5/5/7
Damage: 20/40/60/80/120 (40% Crystal Ratio)
Arcane Fire Bonus: 5/15/25/35/55 (40% Crystal Ratio)
Self-cast Bonus: 5/10/15/20/30 (20% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: Adagio channels for 2 seconds then deals heavy damage to all enemies in a wide, rune-marked ring around him. Enemies burning with Arcane Fire are also stunned. While channeling, Adagio temporarily gains fortified health during channeling.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS: 
Damage: 500/900/1300 (100% Crystal Ratio) 
Stun Duration: 2.2/2.2/2.2 
Range: 9/9/9 
Fortified Health: 100/175/250

heroes.ability1_desc:
Instead of dying, Alpha initiates a reboot sequence upon receiving lethal damage, gaining 325-1800 reserve health (based on level). For the next several seconds, enemies can continue to attack her and deal damage. If her reserve is not destroyed during this time, she will reboot to ample health at the same location.

The cooldown for this ability is displayed in place of Alpha's energy bar. Once this bar is full, Infinite Reboot is available. This bar will slide back to zero during the reboot process, indicating the remaining time left before she is restored to health.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Alpha scans for enemies along a path. If she scans an enemy, that enemy is slowed and Alpha instantly dashes behind them, dealing damage to the target and all enemies within 4.5 meters (65% damage to minions). This also removes the negative effects of Core Overload (without removing the positive effects), dealing increased damage based on the number of stacks removed. 

- Casting this ability will prevent Core Overload stacks from timing out
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage:80/100/120/140/160 (90% Crystal Ratio) (80% Weapon Ratio)
Damage/stack: 40/60/80/100/120 (200% Crystal Ratio) (40% Weapon Ratio)
Range: 10/10/10/10/12
Slow: 40%/50%/60%/70%/80%
Slow Duration: 1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5
heroes.ability3_desc:
Alpha lunges forward, landing a basic attack on her target and fracturing the ground for additional crystal damage in a small area. Each time she uses this ability, she spends 2.5% of her current health and gains Core Overload for 5.5 seconds, stacking up to 3 times.

- Alpha’s basic attack is put on a 50% cooldown after using Core Charge.

Core Overload: The health cost of Core Charge goes up by 2.5%, but also increases the damage of subsequent Core Charges and causes her basic attacks to heal her. Basic attacks refresh the duration.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 20/35/50/65/80 (100% Crystal Ratio) (100% Weapon Ratio)
Cooldown Reduction: 1/1/1/1/1.2
Heal/stack: 5/6/7/8/10 (2% Weapon Ratio)
Damage/stack: 10%/10%/10%/10%/15%
heroes.ability4_desc:
On activation, Alpha begins a self destruct sequence. At the start of this she gains a burst of move speed as well as 400-1000 barrier (based on her level). Immediately afterward, she rapidly loses move speed as her Halcyon core approaches critical mass.

After 3 seconds, or immediately upon her barrier being breached, Alpha explodes. This explosion deals heavy crystal damage to all enemies within 4.5 meters and is lethal to herself.

This ability can only be activated while Infinite Reboot is available. Upgrading this ability reduces the cooldown of Infinite Reboot.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 529/933/1337 (250% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc: Ardan heals for 1% of his missing health every time he takes damage. The healing can never exceed 75% of the damage taken. Instead of energy, Ardan uses a yellow meter called Vengeance. Vengeance builds over time and can also be gained with basic attacks, critical strikes and abilities. Because Ardan has no energy, any bonus energy (5%) and energy regeneration (50%) are converted to crystal power.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Ardan dashes to an ally, damaging and slowing nearby enemies while granting the target a burst of move speed and a 3-second barrier that scales with 25% of Ardan's bonus health. Any time the ally takes damage, Ardan gains vengeance. This ability can be used on Ardan, but the barrier, speed boost and vengeance gain is only half as strong.

Overdrive: Vanguard grants 30% vengeance when cast on an ally.
heroes.ability3_desc: Ardan leaps forward and punches his target. This deals crystal as well as weapon damage (that can crit) and is treated like a basic attack. Blood for Blood can only be activated when Ardan has 100% vengeance and will consume all of it. Overdrive: Blood for Blood deals an additional 25% weapon and crystal damage.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Range: 5/5/5/5/7
Damage: 30/70/110/150/190 (70% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: Ardan throws down the gauntlet, projecting a perimeter around the target area and gaining full vengeance. Enemies who cross the perimeter are stunned and take crystal damage. Successfully stunning an enemy grants Ardan vengeance. If Ardan leaves the perimeter it is immediately destroyed.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 250/375/500 (350% Crystal Ratio)
Stun Duration: 1/1/1
Duration: 4/6/8

heroes.ability1_desc:
Baptiste steals soul fragments through combat and is healed for each soul fragment acquired.
Upon reaching 4 soul fragments, Baptiste is empowered for 4 seconds and deals increased damage but generates no additional soul fragments.
Basic attacks generate one soul fragment
Abilities generate one soul fragment for each enemy hero hit.

DETAILS: 
Heal per Soul Fragment: 15 - 70 (level 1-12) (+ 20% of crystal power)
Empowered Effects: +25% basic-attack damage and +100% ability damange
heroes.ability2_desc: Baptiste pulls a vial of liquid from his vest and throws it. The vial explodes upon reaching its target or when colliding with an enemy. Enemies near the explosion take damage and are slowed.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 80/120/160/200/280 (90% Crystal Ratio)
Splash Damage: 40/60/80/100/140 (45% Crystal Ratio)
Slow: 60%/60%/60%/60%/60%
Slow Duration: 0.8/0.8/0.8/0.8/1.2
heroes.ability3_desc: Baptiste ordains a target enemy, damaging them and creating an ethereal prison around them. If the ordained target leaves the area, they are stunned and take additional damage.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 45/75/105/135/195 (45% Crystal Ratio)
Duration: 2.5/2.5/2.5/2.5/2.5
Tether Break Dmg: 60/100/140/180/260 (60% Crystal Ratio)
Stun Duration: 1.2/1.2/1.2/1.2/1.5
heroes.ability4_desc: Baptiste summons waves of shade that terrorize enemies caught in their path. Enemies struck by the shade run from the source in fear and take damage each second.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage/sec: 100/125/150 (65% Crystal Ratio)
Fear Duration: 1/1.3/1.6

heroes.ability1_desc: Baron’s basic attacks deal 130% weapon damage to the target and surrounding enemies. These explosions deal reduced damage to lane minions.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Baron launches artillery toward the target location, damaging enemies on impact. Enemies caught by the explosion are also slowed for a short period of time. Weapon power strengthens the slow while crystal power increases the range of the ability.

The double attack after using this ability is now automatic upon acquiring a target.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Range:8/8/8/8/8 (1.5% Crystal Ratio)
Damage to Minions: 40/100/160/220/280 (20% Crystal Ratio) (20% Weapon Ratio)
Damage: 40/120/200/280/360 (190% Crystal Ratio) (70% Weapon Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc: After a short delay, Baron launches to the target location, then gains bonus move speed for a short period of time. After landing, his next basic attack fires quickly and reloads instantly. Crystal power can extend the range of the jump while weapon power can shorten the delay of the jump.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Energy Cost: 130/140/150/160/170
Range:10/10/10/10/10 (4% Crystal Ratio)
SpeedBoost: 0.8/1/1.2/1.4/1.8 (4% Crystal Ratio)
Cooldown reduction per basic attack: 12.5%
heroes.ability4_desc: Baron targets a location for an orbital strike. After a brief delay, the location is obliterated, dealing massive damage to all enemies in the area. This deals full damage to enemies near the center and deals less near the edges. This ability also passively increases Baron’s basic attack range every level.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Range:20/35/50
Damage at Center: 400/650/900 (250% Crystal Ratio) (120% Weapon Ratio)
Damage to Minions: 150/225/300 (50% Crystal Ratio) (30% Weapon Ratio)
Bonus Attack Range: 1/1.5/2

heroes.ability1_desc:
Blackfeather's attacks and abilities apply Heartthrob stacks to enemies. This stacks twice on minions and monsters and up to five times on heroes and objectives. Any time stacks are added or refreshed, Blackfeather also deals 5-10 (+10% crystal power) crystal damage for each stacks of Heartthrob already on the target.

Instead of energy, Blackfeather uses focus for his abilities. This is capped at 100 and naturally regenerates 10 per second. Blackfeather also recovers an additional 10 focus for each basic attack he lands.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Blackfeather lunges to his target and basic attacks them. For the next 4 seconds, the target leaves behind a rose trail that grants Blackfeather and his allies movement speed when moving through it.

When this ability is used against a target with full Heartthrob stacks (shown as broken hearts) it will execute the target for bonus true damage based on the target's missing health (capped against non-heroes).

Overdrive: The rose trail also makes Blackfeather and allies unslowable. Additionally, the cooldown for Feint of Heart is reset if the target is killed within 0.5 seconds.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Focus Cost: 50/50/50/50/50
Crystal Damage: 0/0/0/0/0 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Missing Health %: 15%/16%/17%/18%/20% (20% Weapon Ratio)
Cap vs. Non-heroes: 100/200/300/400/500
Heartthrob Stacks Applied: 1/2/3/4/5
Speed Boost: 1/1/1/1/1 (0.6% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc:
Blackfeather pierces all enemies in a line, damaging them and applying a decaying slow for 1 second. The duration of the slow is increased by 0.3 seconds for each stack of Heartthrob on the target.

If this hits at least one enemy hero, Blackfeather also gains a barrier that scales with 10% of his bonus health and recovers 35 focus. The amount of focus recovered is further increased with 2% of his Max Energy and 50% of his Energy Regen.

Overdrive: On Point gains increased range.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Focus Cost: 60/60/60/60/60
Range: 7/7/7/7/9
Damage: 80/120/160/200/240 (180% Crystal Ratio) (50% Weapon Ratio)
Damage to Minions: 90/140/190/240/290 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Slow: 50%/55%/60%/65%/70%
Barrier: 125/150/175/200/250
heroes.ability4_desc:
Blackfeather cuts through his opponents, basic attacking all enemies along his path. During the dash, Blackfeather is immune to negative effects and has fortified health.

This ability has 2 charges.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Charge Time: 40/30/20
Focus Cost: 40/40/40
Damage: 50/100/150 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Fortified Health: 60/100/140

heroes.ability1_desc: Catherine gains 1 armor & shield every time she stuns or silences an enemy hero with her abilities.
heroes.ability2_desc: Catherine gains a burst of move speed for 1.5 seconds. Her next basic attack is replaced by a powerful stun attack. Resets basic attack cooldown on activation.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Bonus Damage: 35/70/105/140/175 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Stun Duration: 1/1/1/1/1.2
heroes.ability3_desc: Activates a pulsating bubble that burns nearby enemies and deflects damage above 77 (+7 per level) to nearby enemies. Each deflection reduces the shield duration by 0.5 second.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Duration: 4/4/4/4/4
Damage/sec: 40/60/80/100/120 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Deflected Damage: 0/5/10/15/25%
heroes.ability4_desc: Catherine slams the ground, damaging & silencing enemies in a large cone in front of her.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 350/500/650 (130% Crystal Ratio)
Silence Duration: 2.2/2.5/2.8
Range: 11/11/11

heroes.ability1_desc: Celeste's basic attacks have a spell component, dealing 65-115 (level 1-12) crystal damage with a 75% crystal ratio. Celeste's basic attacks also reveal enemy heroes for 1.5 seconds - even after the target leaves vision range.
heroes.ability2_desc: Celeste forms a small star at a target location, dealing crystal damage to nearby enemies. The star will briefly linger on the field. If Celeste uses this ability on an existing star, the star will go supernova, dealing more crystal damage in a larger area. Deals reduced damage to minions. Deals reduced damage to turrets if out of range.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 100/150/200/250/300 (90% Crystal Ratio)
Nova Damage: 150/200/250/300/350 (220% Crystal Ratio)
Range: 7/7/7/7/9
Damage to Minions: 100/135/170/205/240 (20% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc: After a brief delay, the target location collapses and nearby enemies are stunned and take crystal damage.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 100/175/250/325/475 (40% Crystal Ratio)
Stun Duration: 1/1/1/1/1.5
heroes.ability4_desc: Celeste launches a storm of stars that travel across the world. Stars collide with the first enemy they hit, dealing crystal damage in an area. The number of stars increases each time Solar Storm is upgraded. Deals 50% to structures.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Lead Star Damage: 300/325/350 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Star Damage: 150/160/170 (20% Crystal Ratio)
Stars: 3/5/7

heroes.ability1_desc: Flicker gains stealth and a move speed bonus when in brush. Flicker can then leave the brush and remain stealthed for a time. Taking damage from enemy heroes or using abilities removes stealth.
heroes.ability2_desc: Flicker commands his fairies to swarm a target location, dealing damage to enemies standing within it. When the effect expires, fairy light roots any enemy heroes still within the area.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage/sec:75/150/225/300/375(25% Crystal Ratio)
Root Duration: 1/1/1/1/1.5
heroes.ability3_desc: After a short duration, the dust ignites, dealing a burst of damage.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Range: 4/4/4/4/4
Damage/sec: 30/60/90/120/180 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Detonate Damage: 60/120/180/240/360 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Slow: 35%/40%/45%/50%/60%
heroes.ability4_desc: After 1.2 seconds Flicker and his allies temporarily gain stealth and a move speed bonus. The stealth will break when a hero uses an ability, attacks or takes damage. This ability will attempt to re-stealth heroes affected while the duration is active.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Duration: 8/9/10

heroes.ability1_desc: When Fortress is near an allied hero, he will move faster after 1 second. He will maintain this move-speed bonus so long as he's alongside any allied hero.
heroes.ability2_desc: Fortress marks the target enemy as prey and his next basic attack becomes a short-range lunge. Fortress and allied heroes gain lifesteal when attacking marked targets and gain move speed when moving toward them.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 20/60/100/140/220 (110% Crystal Ratio)
Speed Boost: 2/2/2/2/3
Duration: 2/2/2/2/3
Lifesteal: 10%/12%/14%/16%/20%
heroes.ability3_desc:
Fortress claws his target for crystal damage and causes it to bleed. Bleeding targets take 10 +15% of crystal power as damage every second. Attacks from Fortress and his allies increase bleeding by one stack. Upon reaching 6 stacks, the target is dealt a burst of damage based on its max health and receives a mortal wound (-33% healing).

Overdrive: Upon reaching 6 stacks, the target is slowed by 30%.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 70/115/160/205/250 (70% Crystal Ratio)
Percent Max Health: 10%/12%/14%/16%/20% (5% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: Fortress howls, gaining fortified health and attack speed and calls to him a pack of wolves. Each pack wolf seeks out a different enemy hero. These wolves apply bleeding with their basic attacks. It takes three separate attacks to kill a pack wolf.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Duration: 10/12/14
Attack Speed: 30%/45%/60%
Fortified Health: 300/425/550
Wolf Attack Damage: 20/40/60

heroes.ability1_desc: Glaive's critical strikes cleave in a cone in front of him.
heroes.ability2_desc: Glaive rockets in the target direction, damaging all enemies along the way. His next basic attack is replaced by a frightening blast that knocks his target back 5.5 meters.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 100/150/200/250/300 (130% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc:
Passive: Increase critical strike chance and AOE cleave damage of basic attacks.

Activate: Instantly execute a critical strike. This deals weapon damage and is treated like a basic attack, but can deal bonus crystal damage if you have any crystal power. Cleave deals half damage to minions.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Cleave Damage: 30%/35%/40%/45%/65%
Critical Chance: 9%/13%/17%/21%/25%
Crystal Damage: 0/0/0/0/0 (120% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc:
Passive: Glaive will generate Bloodsong stacks from basic attacking or from receiving basic attacks. Each stack grants him bonus lifesteal. Max 20 stacks.

Activate: Swings Glaive's axe in a 5.4-meter circle, dealing massive area damage based on number of Bloodsong stacks used. This removes all stacks. Glaive also gains full stacks of Bloodsong whenever he dies.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Base Damage: 100/200/300 (110% Crystal Ratio)
Damage/stack: 10/15/20 (2% Crystal Ratio)
Lifesteal Per Stack: 1%/1%/1%

heroes.ability1_desc:
Grumpjaw's hardened carapace grants him increased defenses. Every few seconds and every time he basic attacks, he gains a stack of Living Armor, up to a maximum of 5 stacks. Each stack grants bonus Armor and Shield. Enemies can remove stacks of Living Armor by dealing damage to Grumpjaw. He loses one stack per second while taking damage from basic attacks and abilities.
DETAILS:
+ 6% damage reduction per stack
heroes.ability2_desc: Grumpjaw charges to a target location, dealing crystal damage and slowing enemies in an area upon reaching his destination. Grumpjaw deals bonus damage for each stack of Living Armor.
heroes.ability3_desc: Grumpjaw leaps toward his target and attacks them. Afterward, he gains bonus weapon damage and attack speed for several seconds.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Bonus Speed Duration: 4/4/4/4/5
Damage: 20/40/60/80/100 (80% Crystal Ratio)
Attack Speed: 20%/30%/40%/50%/60%
heroes.ability4_desc: Grumpjaw lunges forward, grabbing the first enemy hero in his path and devouring them whole. While the enemy is inside Grumpjaw's belly, they are unable to move or act and their vision range is reduced to zero. After a few seconds, Grumpjaw will spit the enemy out in the direction he is facing. Grumpjaw can reactivate the ability to spit the enemy out early in a direction of his choice. If Grumpjaw is stunned, killed, or otherwise interrupted while eating, he will release his victim early.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 400/500/700 (200% Crystal Ratio)
Stun Duration: 3/3/3

heroes.ability1_desc: After not attacking for a brief time, Gwen’s next basic attack deals additional weapon damage. Attack speed reduces the time before this empowered attack becomes available.
heroes.ability2_desc: Gwen blasts enemies in the target direction, damaging all targets in a cone. Enemies hit by this ability are slowed and revealed for a short time.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 60/100/140/180/220 (210% Crystal Ratio) (65% Weapon Ratio)
Damage to Minions: 60/100/140/180/260 (50% Crystal Ratio) (30% Weapon Ratio)
Decaying Slow: 40%/45%/50%/55%/65%
heroes.ability3_desc:
When activated, Gwen instantly removes negative effects from herself and blocks further effects for a short time. Additionally, she gains a temporary burst of bonus move speed.

Passive: Gwen gains bonus move speed. This effect is disabled for a few seconds upon taking damage from an enemy hero, but it is otherwise permanent.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
SpeedBoost: 1.2/1.4/1.6/1.8/2.2
Bonus Speed duration: 1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5
heroes.ability4_desc: Gwen pulls an ace from up her sleeve and flings it in the target direction. The card deals damage to everything it passes through. The ace impacts and stuns the first enemy hero in its path.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 250/400/550 (240% Crystal Ratio)(100% Weapon Ratio)
Damage to Minions: 200/325/450 (50% Crystal Ratio)(25% Weapon Ratio)
Stun Duration: 1/1.2/1.4

heroes.ability1_desc:
Idris unlocks unique powers for either his melee or ranged paths upon attaining a certain amount of weapon or crystal power.
DETAILS:

Melee (Weapon): Idris’s Shroudstep becomes an instantaneous blink. Passively, his melee attacks restore stamina and reduce the cooldowns of his Shroudstep and Shimmer Strike abilities.

Ranged (Crystal): Idris gains ranged basic attacks, dealing crystal and weapon damage and applying on-hit effects.

Instead of energy, Idris uses stamina to activate his abilities. Purchasing items with energy and energy regeneration increases his stamina and stamina regeneration.
heroes.ability2_desc: Idris dashes in the target direction, dealing amplified damage to the next target he attacks within seconds. If Idris has not taken damage within the last few seconds, Shroudstep grants a barrier. The availability of the barrier is displayed beneath his stamina meter.
heroes.ability3_desc: Idris throws a chakram that returns to him, damaging enemies each time it passes over them. Hitting enemy heroes, miners, or kraken recovers stamina. Idris can use his Shroudstep and Shimmer Strike abilities to avoid catching returning chakrams, giving him additional opportunities to strike enemies.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Stamina Cost: 30/30/30/30/30
Damage: 75/125/175/225/275 (130% Crystal Ratio) (100% Weapon Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 75/100/125/150/175(25% Crystal Ratio) (25% Weapon Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: Idris latches onto the target hero, becoming invulnerable, then leaps off in the chosen direction, damaging surrounding enemies. The distance Idris leaps is increased in his crystal path.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Stamina Cost: 0/0/0/
Damage: 200/350/500/(100% Weapon Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc: Joule has bonus armor & shield protecting her from basic attacks that hit her on the front. Bonus defense starts at 50 at level 1 and ranks up to 175 at level 12.
heroes.ability2_desc: Joule leaps to a target location. Enemies caught underneath Joule take full damage and are stunned, while enemies near the impact are knocked away, slowed and take 33% damage.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 150/200/250/300/350 (170% Crystal Ratio)
Stun Duration: 1.1/1.2/1.3/1.4/1.5
heroes.ability3_desc:
Sends a bolt of energy directly in front of Joule. If this strikes an enemy, every Thunder Strike that follows will have bonus armor pierce & shield pierce until you miss. Thunder Strike's cooldown scales with attack speed.

Overdrive: Weapon damage can critically strike
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 80/110/140/170/200 (135% Crystal Ratio) (175% Weapon Ratio)
Bonus Pierce: 5%/6%/7%/8%/10%
Damage to Minions: 80/120/160/200/240 (80% Crystal Ratio) (33% Weapon Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: Joule fires a massive beam of energy in a target direction dealing damage over 1.5 seconds to all targets along its path. The force of this beam pushes Joule backward during channeling. Deals half damage to turrets.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Total Damage: 800/1500/2200 (460% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc: Whenever Kestrel lands a basic attack, she gains 5% attack speed and reduces the cost of her abilities by 10%.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Kestrel fires an arrow, landing an armor-piercing basic attack on the first target in its path. The arrow then pierces through, dealing crystal damage to the target and other enemies behind it.

Kestrel can keep several arrows in reserve. After 3.3 seconds without using her bow, these arrows are automatically reloaded. Reload time is decreased based on attack speed.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Max Arrows: 4/4/4/4/4
Basic Attack Damage: 100%/105%/110%/115%/130%Crystal Damage: 30/60/90/120/150 color=#73dfff](160% Crystal Ratio)[/color]
Splash Damage: 35/70/105/140/175 (170% Crystal Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 30/60/90/120/150 (30% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc:
Kestrel instantly vanishes from sight and gains bonus move speed. Additionally, she leaves an invisible phosphor mist at her location, revealing enemies as they walk through it. If Kestrel deals damage to an enemy hero within the mist, the mist will detonate, damaging and stunning all enemies within its area for 0.8 seconds.

Landing the primary impact of Glimmershot will reduce the cooldown by 1.5 seconds. However, Active Camo cannot be triggered while Kestrel is taking damage from an enemy hero, putting it on a 2.5 second cooldown. The length of time Active Camo is disabled is reduced by bonus weapon power.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Stealth Duration: 1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5/2 (3% Crystal Ratio)
Speed Boost: 1/1/1/1/1 (0.2% Weapon Ratio)
Mist Duration: 4/5/6/7/8/ (1% Crystal Ratio)
Damage: 100/150/200/250/300 (270% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc:
After a delay, Kestrel fires a single arrow across the fold, impacting on the first enemy hero, large creature or structure in its path. When this hits an enemy hero, it reveals that hero and grants Kestrel full Adrenaline stacks. This deals 50% structures.

The base damage dealt by this ability is weapon damage. Higher ranks of this ability gain armor piercing.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 450/625/800 (260% Crystal Ratio) (120% Weapon Ratio)
Armor Piercing: 10%/20%/30%
Reveal Duration: 2/4/6

heroes.ability1_desc: Koshka gains 2 move speed for 4s whenever she deals damage with her abilities.
heroes.ability2_desc: Koshka dashes to the target enemy and deals damage.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 75/130/185/240/350 (130% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc:
Koshka twirls, damaging all enemies around her. Her next 2 basic attacks within 5 seconds deal bonus crystal damage.

Empowered attacks have lower cooldown (0.5s) than her normal basic attacks (0.8s)
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 80/120/160/200/280 (80% Crystal Ratio)
Bonus Damage: 35/50/65/80/110 (120% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: Koshka leaps at her target then launches into a flurry of slashes, stunning the target for the entire 2.2 second duration. Koshka will cancel her ult if the stun is Reflex Blocked.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Total Damage: 350/575/800 (120% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc: Krul is empowered by the shadows after standing still in brush for 1.5 seconds. Once empowered, Krul briefly gains 2 move speed and his next basic attack will slow the target by 40% for 2.5 seconds.
heroes.ability2_desc: Krul dashes to the target, deals damage and applies basic-attack effects. Activating Dead Man's Rush grants Krul a health barrier for 2.5 seconds.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Basic Attack Damage: 160%/160%/160%/160%/160%
Crystal Damage: 0%/0%/0%/0%/0% (70% Crystal Ratio)
Barrier: 100/180/260/340/420 (125% Crystal Ratio)
Duration: 3/3/3/3/3
heroes.ability3_desc:
Passive: Basic attacks & abilities apply Weakness for 4 seconds (up to 8 stacks) with a 0.5% crystal ratio. Each stack reduces the target's damage by 6.2% and increases Krul's lifesteal against the weakened target.

Activate: Detonate the stacks to deal damage and regain health based on the number of stacks consumed.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 100/150/200/250/350 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Damage/stack: 20/35/50/65/95 (20% Crystal Ratio)
Heal: 40/60/80/100/140 (35% Crystal Ratio)
Heal/stack: 15/20/25/30/40 (20% Crystal Ratio)
Lifesteal/stack: 12.5%/12.5%/12.5%/12.5%/12.5%
heroes.ability4_desc: Krul pulls Hellrazor from his chest and hurls it in the targeted direction. The sword will boomerang back to Krul after reaching max range. If the sword hits an enemy hero, it deals damage and stuns, then slows the target. Damage and stun duration scales with the distance the sword traveled before hitting the target. (50% at point blank range, 100% at max range and up to 150% at 'boomerang' range).
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 350/500/650 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Slow Duration: 3/3.5/4
Stun Duration: 1.8/2/2.2

heroes.ability1_desc:
Lance's basic attacks damage every target along their path. However, his attacks are slow to land and attack speed is less effective on him.

Instead of energy, Lance uses stamina to activate his abilities. Purchasing items with energy and energy regeneration increases his stamina and stamina regeneration.

Max Stamina: 100 + 20% Max Energy
Stamina Regen: 15+50% Energy Regen
heroes.ability2_desc:
Lance strikes through his opponents, dealing weapon damage and rooting them in place (max 1.6 seconds). If this attack hits at least one enemy, Lance will immediately recover from the ability.

Overdrive: If this hits an enemy, it also resets the cooldown of Combat Roll.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Stamina Cost: 30/30/30/30/30
Damage: 120/210/300/390/480 (80% Crystal Ratio) (140% Weapon Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 80/120/160/200/240 (60% Crystal Ratio) (60% Weapon Ratio)
Root Duration: 1/1/1/1/1.2 (0.2% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc:
Passive: Lance strafes around the enemy he has most recently attacked. While strafing, he reduces damage from the target's direction by up to 50%.

Active: Lance sweeps opponents away with his polearm, dealing weapon damage and also stunning them if they collide with a wall or structure (max 1.4 seconds). Afterward, he holds his shield steadfast, greatly reducing incoming damage from the target direction by up to 90%.

Both the passive and the active damage reduction are 50% effective against turrets.

Overdrive: While active, Lance ignores all debuffs (from any direction).
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Stamina Cost: 40/40/40/40/40
Damage: 80/120/160/200/240 (80% Crystal Ratio) (100% Weapon Ratio)
Stun Duration: 0.6/0.7/0.8/0.9/1 (0.2% Crystal Ratio)
Passive Damage Reduction: 10%/12%/14%/16%/20% (10% Crystal Ratio)
Active Damage Reduction: 25%/30%/35%/40%/45% (15% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: Lance rolls in the target direction. His next basic attack within 2 seconds will strike quickly, dealing bonus crystal damage.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Stamina Cost: 30/25/20
Damage: 50/100/150 (60% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc: Lyra’s attacks are arcane missiles, dealing 50-85 (+40% CP) crystal damage. If she holds her ground after releasing an attack, she automatically channels and releases a much stronger arcane missile that deals 60-170 (+60% CP) additional crystal damage and briefly slows its target by 35% + 1% bonus health ratio. Each channeled missile consumes 15-20 energy, but Lyra can continue using these even if she runs out of energy.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Lyra forms a sigil at the target location, revealing surrounding enemies. While this sigil remains active, it heals nearby allied heroes and damages nearby enemy heroes, with its own life diminishing more quickly for each affected target.

Lyra can reactivate this ability at any time to detonate the sigil, dealing heavy damage to surrounding enemies while providing a burst of healing and a moderate move speed boost (2.0) to nearby allies.

The healing per second is increased by 10% of Lyra's bonus health, while the burst heal is increased by 8% of Lyra's bonus health.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Range: 10/10/10/10/12
Damage/sec: 60/100/140/180/260 (80% Crystal Ratio)
Heal/sec: 40/60/80/100/140+ 12% Bonus Health
Detonate Damage: 75/125/175/225/325 (120% Crystal Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 75/125/175/225/325 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Detonate Heal: 50/70/90/110/150
heroes.ability3_desc:
After a brief delay, Lyra releases a pulse of magical energy, damaging and applying an 20% flat slow to surrounding enemies. The affected area then becomes a walled zone of protection that deals the same damage and slow to enemies attempting to cross its borders.

Enemies inside the zone are snared, allowing them to move normally but preventing them from using movement abilities. Enemies attempting to dash into the area are interrupted upon crossing the walls.

Enemies inside the zone cannot use Lyra’s portals for the entire duration inside.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Duration:
2.5/2.5/2.5/2.5/2.5
Damage: 50/125/200/275/350 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Slow Duration: 1/1.2/1.4/1.6/2
heroes.ability4_desc:
Lyra blinks to the target location, leaving portals at both the beginning and the end of the blink. Portals last for 8.5 seconds, allowing allied and enemy heroes to move freely between them in both directions.

After traveling through a portal, heroes must wait 4.5 seconds before they can re-enter a portal. This cooldown is also applied to enemies when Lyra hits them with the initial pulse of Bright Bulwark.

Heroes standing directly on top of a portal as it forms must step off the portal before they can use it.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Range: 9/10/11

heroes.ability1_desc: Ozo receives 15%-30% additional healing, barrier and fortified health from all sources. (This does not affect health regeneration.)
heroes.ability2_desc:
Ozo performs a three-hit combo with his ring. Each part of the combo is a separate tap within a 5-second window.

First hit: Ozo thrusts his ring forward, damaging the target and other enemies in front of him.
Second hit: Ozo dashes through his target and deals damage.
Final hit: Ozo spins, damaging all nearby enemies.

Each hit deals weapon damage, can crit and triggers basic-attack effects. Ozo heals for each enemy damaged by any of these hits (30% against non-heroes).
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
First Hit Damage: 10/20/30/40/50 (75% Crystal Ratio)
Second Hit Damage: 10/20/30/40/50 (75% Crystal Ratio)
Third Hit Damage: 10/20/30/40/50 (75% Crystal Ratio)
Healing vs. Heroes: 15/30/45/60/75 (15% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc:
Ozo hops onto the head of a nearby target (enemy, ally or creature), slowing it by 60% and damaging it (no negative effects to allies). While Ozo is airborne, quickly tap a nearby target to bounce off one head to the other. Three hops maximum. The final hop deals increased damage plus a bonus per prior bounce. If Ozo hops at least twice, he’ll get a burst of move speed. Reduced crystal scaling vs. minions.

- Maximum speed boost caps at 4.5 (200 weapon power)
- Maximum speed boost duration caps at 2.5 (200 weapon power)
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Bounce Damage: 60/120/180/240/300 (70% Crystal Ratio)
Final Damage: 80/160/240/320/400 (70% Crystal Ratio)
Add'l Dmg Per Bounce: 20/40/60/80/100 (35% Crystal Ratio)
Fortified Health: 20/40/60/80/100 (15% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: Ozo charges up before tumbling to a targeted enemy hero. If he reaches the target within 1 second, he deals damage, stuns for 0.8 seconds and flips the target over his ring to behind him. While tumbling, Ozo will knock aside and deal reduced damage to all other enemies in his path.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Primary Target Damage: 250/400/550 (150% Crystal Ratio)
Secondary Target Damage: 125/200/275 (75% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc:
Petal's basic attacks mark enemy heroes with sunlight.

DETAILS: 
Damage: 6/13/20/27/41 + (40% Crystal Ratio)
Range: 7.5
Attack Range: 0.9
heroes.ability2_desc: Petal plants a Brambleboom seed directly in front of her. Seeds have a small vision radius. A few moments after Petal plants a seed, it will automatically sprout into a munion which will fight alongside Petal up to a maximum of 3 munions. If an enemy steps on a seed, the seed explodes and knocks the enemy back.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Pet Health: 100/170/240/310/450 (25% Crystal Ratio)
Pet Defense: 30/35/40/45/50 (5% Crystal Ratio)
Pet Damage: 7/14/21/28/42 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Seed Health: 50/80/110/140/200 (15% Crystal Ratio)
Damage: 75/125/175/225/275 (100% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc: Petal leaps in the target direction, leaving a seed behind at her original location. Using the ability will amplify Petal's weapon, crystal power, and attack range for 4 seconds.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Crystal Amp: 20%
Weapon Amp: 20%
Increased Basic Attack Range: 0.0/0.2/0.4/0.6/1.2
heroes.ability4_desc: Petal commands a munion to explode, slowing and dealing splash damage to nearby enemies while healing nearby allies. Detonated pets become seeds. This ability has 3 charges.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 180/240/300 (70% Crystal Ratio)
Charge Time: 35/30/25
Heal: 60/100/140 (20% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc: Phinn cannot be stopped or stunned. All movement-impairing effects are instead reduced to moderate slows. He even shrugs off attempts on his life, passively gaining 15% additional armor, shield and max health from items and effects.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Phinn slams his anchor down on a neighboring location, heavily slowing enemies for 0.9 seconds.

Overdrive: This upgrades the slow into a stun!
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 160/270/380/490/600 (170% Crystal Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 160/220/280/340/400 (60% Crystal Ratio)
Slow: 55%/60%/65%/70%/0%
heroes.ability3_desc: Phinn stomps the earth, dealing crystal damage to all enemies in a wide area and launching them toward him. The effect reverberates around allies, granting them fortified health (increased by 6% of Phinn's bonus health and 20% of Phinn's bonus armor/shield) for the next 3 seconds.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 60/120/180/240/360 (120% Crystal Ratio)
Fortified Health: 120/150/180/210/270
heroes.ability4_desc: Phinn throws his anchor in a direction.After the anchor reaches its destination he yanks it back, damaging all enemies in its path and pulling them back to him. If Phinn doesn't pull any enemies, a percentage of the cooldown is refunded.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 100/300/500 (150% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc:
Reim's basic attacks deal 15-54 (+90% crystal power) bonus crystal damage over 2 seconds and grant 25% of the damage dealt with this effect as fortified health (reduced against non-heroes).

Reim's attacks and abilities also chill opponents. Basic attacks against targets that are already chilled apply a 60% slow that decays over 0.6 seconds.

(Fortified health absorbs 20% of incoming damage until it is depleted.)
heroes.ability2_desc:
Reim summons a spire of ice at a nearby location, dealing crystal damage to surrounding enemies. After a short delay, the spire shatters, dealing heavy crystal damage. 35% of the damage dealt with this ability is gained as fortified health. Damage dealt and fortified health gained is reduced against non-heroes.

This ability deals 25% increased damage to chilled targets.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Range: 5/5.5/6/6.5/7.5
First Hit Damage: 80/120/160/200/240 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Second Hit Damage: 80/120/160/200/240 (140% Crystal Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 90/105/120/135/165 (25% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc:
Reim deals a burst of crystal damage to all surrounding enemies.

This ability roots enemies who are chilled, temporarily preventing them from moving. A rooted enemy can still attack.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 80/120/160/200/280 (40% Crystal Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 80/95/110/125/140 (10% Crystal Ratio)
Root Duration: 0.6/0.8/1/1.2/1.4
heroes.ability4_desc: Reim summons an ancient valkyrie, devastating enemies at the target location. All enemies are slowed, while enemies closer to the center are stunned and take increased damage.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage at Center: 250/375/500 (125% Crystal Ratio)
Damage at Edge: 200/300/400 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Center Slow Duration: 3/4.5/6
Edge Slow Duration: 2/3/4
Slow: 60%/70%/80%
Stun Duration: 0.8/1/1.2

heroes.ability1_desc: Ringo's next basic attack after killing anything will be a critical strike.
heroes.ability2_desc: Ringo fires a trick shot at his target's heel (or whatever lower extremity exists), slowing the target & dealing damage.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 80/125/170/215/350 (125% Crystal Ratio)
Slow Amount: 30%/35%/40%/45%/50%
Slow Duration: 1.5/1.5/1.5/1.5/2.5
heroes.ability3_desc: Ringo slings bullets at his target in a mad flurry, dramatically increasing his attack speed & move speed. Resets basic attack cooldown on activation.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Attack speed: 15%/25%/35%/45%/65%
Duration: 6/6/6/6/6
Crystal damage: 0/0/0/0/0 (80% Crystal Ratio)
Bonus Movespeed: 0.75/0.80/0.85/0.90/1.00
heroes.ability4_desc: Ringo takes a long swig from his gourd and breathes out a scorching fireball at his target. The explosion pierces all shield, deals splash damage on impact and sets the target on fire, burning it & nearby enemies for 7 seconds.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 250/365/480 (75% Crystal Ratio)
Burn Damage: 30/50/70 (20% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc:
Rona attacks 40% faster than most heroes, but she deals 80% damage with each attack.

Additionally, Rona's abilities use Bloodrage instead of energy, a unique resource that is generated from basic attacks, abilities and taking damage from enemies. This caps at 100 and decays when Rona leaves combat.

The ability also grants Rona 85% Weapon ratio.
heroes.ability2_desc: Rona leaps into battle, gaining 20 bloodrage from colliding with each enemy hero. She also gains fortified health for 3 seconds based on the number of enemy heroes she hits. After a short delay, the ground ruptures for 3 seconds, slowing enemies who pass over it for 35%.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Impact Damage: 50/70/90/110/150 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Rupture Damage: 100/140/180/220/300 (200% Crystal Ratio)
Fortified Health: 30/40/50/60/80
heroes.ability3_desc: Rona lunges to her target, landing a basic attack and granting herself increased move speed for 2 seconds. After using this ability she can briefly reactivate it to attack again, consuming up to 100 additional bloodrage, applying a mortal wound to her target, and granting her 25% additional attack speed for 2 seconds. All damage of the second attack is increased by 1% for each point of bloodrage consumed. Rona's basic attack reduce Foesplitter's cooldown by 1 second.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Bloodrage Gain: 5/10/15/20/25
First Attack Damage: 10/20/30/40/70 (100% Crystal Ratio) (85% Weapon Ratio)
Second Attack Damage: 10/20/30/40/70 (100% Crystal Ratio) (80% Weapon Ratio)
Attack Speed: 15%/20%/25%/30%/40%
Duration: 2/2.5/3/3.5/4
heroes.ability4_desc: Rona begins an axe-wielding whirlwind, continually dealing weapon damage to nearby enemies. During the whirlwind she can move freely but at reduced speed, and gains fortified health each second. She can cancel the ability at any time by reactivating it or using another ability. Red Mist requires at least 75 bloodrage to activate. Deals half damage to minions.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Bloodrage per Second: 25/25/25
Bloodrage required to activate: 25
Damage: 225/350/475 (100% Crystal Ratio) (175% Weapon Ratio)
Fortified Health/sec: 40/70/100

heroes.ability1_desc: Every 6 seconds, Samuel’s next basic attack fires a bolt of dark power at the target, dealing 50-160 (+60% CP) bonus crystal damage. Samuel then draws that power back to himself, restoring 50-160 health and 50-160 energy. The restorative effects are only 25% as effective against non-heroes.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Samuel fires two quick shots from his wands at a target location that impact on the first enemy hit. Samuel can move between the shots.

If Samuel is standing inside the field from Drifting Dark, this ability is empowered. While empowered, the shots move faster, travel farther, deal additional damage and burst upon impact dealing damage in a small area.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Range: 10/10/10/10/10
Damage: 60/90/120/150/210 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Empowered Damage: 75/105/135/165/225 (115% Crystal Ratio)
Empwrd Dmg to Minions: 35/50/65/80/110 (20% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc: Samuel creates a large field of darkness that slowly drifts forward, damaging enemies who stand inside it. If Samuel also stands inside, he heals for a small amount for each affected target.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Range: 14/18/22/26/34
Travel Speed: 2.8/2.8/2.8/2.8/3.4
Damage/sec: 40/55/70/85/100 (10% Crystal Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 20/35/50/65/80 (5% Crystal Ratio)
Heal/sec per target: 2/4/6/8/10 (10% Crystal Ratio)
Heal/sec per minion: 1/2/3/4/5 (5% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc:
After a short delay, Samuel summons a phantasm at the target location, which puts nearby enemies to sleep. Enemies inflicted are unable to move or act.

Dealing direct damage to a sleeping enemy with an attack or ability will wake them up.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 200/325/450 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Duration: 2/2.5/3

heroes.ability1_desc: Each basic attack increases SAW's attack speed by 18% and armor & shield by 1, but it also decreases his move speed by -0.12 (up to 12 stacks). After 3.5s without basic attacking, SAW will lose 1 stack of Spin Up every 0.2s.
heroes.ability2_desc: SAW sprints & switches to a melee combat knife. If SAW attacks someone, he will deal bonus damage based on the target's missing health & roll backwards. Activating this ability clears all stacks of Spin Up. Crystal will boost the speed, up to a maximum of +3.2.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Missing Health %: 20%/25%/30%/35%/45%
Base Damage: 60/140/220/300/380 (280% Crystal Ratio)
Speed Boost: 2.5/2.5/2.5/2.5/2.5 (1.5% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc: SAW fires a hurricane of bullets in a set direction for 2 seconds, damaging and slowing enemies in its path. Finishing this ability grants all stacks of Spin Up and resets the cooldown of Roadie Run. Deal reduced damage to turrets if out of range.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Slow Duration: 2/2/2/2/2.5
Total Damage: 240/360/480/600/960 (400% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability4_desc: SAW loads explosive shells into his gun which deal additional damage based on the target's missing health. The shells also deal splash damage based on the amount of crystal power SAW has. This explosive ammo fires 36% slower and grants 2 stacks of Spin Up.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Number of Shells: 5/7/9
Missing Health %: 15%/15%/15%
Crystal Damage: 40/60/80 (140% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc: Skaarf's fire-based abilities burn targets for 10 damage per second for 4 seconds. Basic attacks against burning targets deal 3% (+3% of crystal power) of the target's max health as crystal damage. This damage can crit for 2x. Deals reduced damage to Kraken and structures.
heroes.ability2_desc: Skaarf spits a fireball that burns and damages anything in its path and collides with the first hero, structure, or boss monster it hits. Each target the fireball passthrough reduces its damage by 85%. Deals reduced damage to turrets if out of range.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 75/135/195/255/315 (150% Crystal Ratio)
Fireball Speed: 9/9.5/10/10.5/11
Dmg to Minions: 75/125/175/225/325 (35% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc: Skaarf hurls goop onto the target location. Enemies walking through the sticky substance are slowed. Any of Skaarf's flames will ignite the puddle, dealing burst damage and burning enemies over time.However, a flaming puddle does not slow enemies as much as a goop puddle. Deals half damage to minions & Kraken.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Ignite Damage: 80/120/160/200/240 (70% Crystal Ratio)
Damage/sec: 60/90/120/150/180 (140% Crystal Ratio)
Duration: 8/8/8/8/10
Duration on Fire: 4/4/4/4/6
heroes.ability4_desc: Skaarf inhales deeply for 1.5 seconds, slowing fleeing enemies and accelerating closing allies. Skaarf then exhales flame for 3 seconds, incinerating enemies in a cone in front of him. While exhaling, enemies moving against the flame are slowed while allies moving with the flame are accelerated. Skaarf may move freely while spewing fire, but he cannot basic attack or use other abilities. Each time Dragon Breath is upgraded it adds shield piercing to the exhale damage. Skaarf temporarily gains fortified health while channeling.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Total Damage: 650/925/1200 (300% Crystal Ratio)
Shield Pierce: 15%/30%/45%
Fortified Health: 150/250/300

heroes.ability1_desc: Skye locks onto and reveals the target she most recently basic attacked. Basic attacks and Forward Barrage on that locked target grant her up to 2 move speed for 1.2 seconds. This speed bonus is dramatically reduced while moving backward. Target Lock is lost if the target moves more than 8.5 meters away from Skye or if she doesn't attack her target for 3 seconds.
heroes.ability2_desc:
Skye fires a continuous stream of bullets while strafing in a selected direction. Reactivate this ability to stop firing.

The duration increases with Skye's crystal power up to a max of 3 seconds. Weapon damage can critically strike with bonus critical damage. Deals bonus damage to locked targets. Deals 60% damage to structures & bosses.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage/sec: 160/200/240/280/360 (210% Crystal Ratio) (70% Weapon Ratio)
Bonus Crit Damage: 100%/100%/100%/100%/150%
Lock-On Damage Bonus: 10%/10%/10%/10%/10% (10% Crystal Ratio)
Slow: 0%/0%/0%/0%/0% (20% Weapon Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc:
Active: Skye dashes to a chosen location near her locked target while a volley of missiles along a line between her and her target. Multiple missiles can hit the same target, but sequent hits deal 20% damage. This ability can only be activated when Skye has a locked target. Activating this ability resets a portion of the cooldown on Forward Barrage.

Passive: Each ability point in Suri Strike increases the duration of target-lock.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 90/150/210/270/330 (100% Crystal Ratio)
Dmg to Minions: 90/120/150/180/210 (30% Crystal Ratio)
Duration Bonus: 1/1.5/2/2.5/4
Cooldown Reset: 40%/55%/70%/85%/100%
heroes.ability4_desc:
Active: Skye fires a salvo of missiles at a chosen location near her locked target. After a 1.3 second delay, the missiles rain down on that location, stunning enemies for 0.5 seconds. Enemies still in the area afterward are slowed and take crystal damage. Aiming directly on your locked target rains down the missiles in a cluster. Aiming away from your locked target rains them down in a line across the target's path. This ability can only be activated when Skye has a locked target. Deals 40% damage to structures & bosses.

Passives: Each ability point in Death from Above increases Skye's target-lock range.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Duration: 2/3/4
Damage/sec: 250/300/350 (50% Crystal Ratio)
Slow: 55%/60%/65%
Range Bonus: 2/4/6

heroes.ability1_desc: Every 5 seconds, Taka's next basic attack is replaced with a Mortal Strike. Mortal Strikes deal 40 (+30% weapon ratio) bonus damage and grant Taka a burst of move speed. Whenever Taka Mortal Strikes or uses an ability, he gains a stack of Ki, which speeds up his Mortal Strike timer by 0.9 secs and grants 20% cooldown speed. (5 Ki stacks max.) Ki stacks last 12 seconds before they are reset.
heroes.ability2_desc: Taka flips over his target, cutting it with his switchblade. Taka is invulnerable to damage & debuffs while in mid-air.
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 100/165/230/295/360 (80% Crystal Ratio)
heroes.ability3_desc: Taka throws a smoke bomb at his feet, vanishing from enemy sight and gaining move speed. This illusion ends early if he strikes a target or he takes direct damage. Turrets and Flare Guns can still see Taka. This ability heals Taka while he is invisible.
heroes.ability4_desc: Taka bursts through his target, carving an X with his switchblades for lethal damage. The target suffers a mortal wound, reducing its healing by 50% and taking damage per second over the next 3 seconds. The wound's duration is refreshed whenever Taka mortal strikes this target. Grants bonus Ki stacks upon use based on number of ability points in X-Retsu.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Damage: 250/400/550 (170% Crystal Ratio)
Damage/sec: 40/50/60 (70% Crystal Ratio)

heroes.ability1_desc: Vox's abilities mark enemies with Resonance. When basic attacking enemies with Resonance, bolts will bounce outwards to two nearby enemies dealing 20/60/80/100/140 (+90% crystal ratio) crystal damage and refreshing and spreading Resonance. (Resonance bounces deal 50% damage to minions.)
heroes.ability2_desc: Vox dashes in the targeted direction, throwing two basic attacks to the nearest enemy marked by Resonance (prioritizing heroes).
heroes.ability2_detail:
DETAILS:
Basic Attack Damage: 50%/50%/50%/50%/60%
heroes.ability3_desc: Vox emits a sonic pulse that echoes off nearby enemies and applies Resonance. The pulse applies a slow that is significantly stronger near its center and lasts 1.2 seconds. Each upgrade to Pulse increases the damage of Vox's bouncing attacks to enemy heroes.
heroes.ability3_detail:
DETAILS:
Bounce Damage Bonus: 25/50/75/100/150
Slow At Center: 20%/22%/24%/26%/30%
Slow At Edge: 10%/12%/14%/16%/20%
heroes.ability4_desc: Vox fires an ultrasonic wave that applies Resonance to enemies in its path and refreshes all Resonance. Shortly after, a wide shockwave explodes along the same path, dealing crystal damage and silencing enemies. Striking enemy heroes with the shockwave will also cause Resonance to bounce.
heroes.ability4_detail:
DETAILS:
Initial Damage: 100/150/200 (20% Crystal Ratio)
Shockwave Damage: 100/150/200 (40% Crystal Ratio)
Silence Duration: 0.7/0.7/0.7

items.desc:
Activate: Reflex Block (35s cooldown)

+125 Shield
+30 Armor
+200 Max Health

(Greatly reduces damage from enemy abilities.)

After using an ability, your next basic attack deals 15% of your target's max health as damage with +50% lifesteal. Max 400 damage vs non-heroes. 1.5 second cooldown.

+25% Cooldown Speed
+2.5 Energy Recharge
+35 Crystal Power

(Very effective against enemies with high health.)

Every other basic attack deals 70% of your crystal power as bonus damage.

+60 crystal power
+35% attack speed

(Helps you deal consistent damage after you've built enough crystal power.)

+85 Armor
+35 Shield

Active: Reduces attack speed of nearby enemies by 65% for 5 seconds in a 4-meter range. Does not reduce below the base attack speed animation. (15s cooldown)

(Counters enemies with high attack speed, but you must get close to the enemies to affect them.)

+12 Weapon Power
+10% Weapon Lifesteal

Passive: Restores 40 health whenever you kill an enemy (85 if using a melee default attack).

(Helps you stay healthy while last-hitting in lane.)
+20% Attack Speed

On Hit: Your basic attacks shred 5% of the target's armor for 3 seconds. Max 8 stacks.

+8% Armor Pierce
+15 Weapon Power
+25% Attack Speed

(Effective against turrets and enemies with high armor. Best if you or your team are already dealing lots of weapon damage.)

+5 Weapon Power

Passive: Restores 30 health whenever you kill a minion or monster (60 if using a melee default attack).

(Helps you stay healthy while last-hitting in lane.)

Passive: Gain 10 weapon power for every 140 Weapon damage dealt to enemy heroes (+5 damage needed for each stack thereafter). 20 stacks max. Decays 3 stacks per second after you’ve stopped stacking for 2 seconds.

+20% Attack Speed
+55 Weapon Power

(Very weak at first, but becomes extremely powerful over the course of long battles.)

Passive: Amplify all crystal damage by 4% for each second you are in combat against heroes. After 5 seconds, you lose a stack each second. Max 9 stacks.

+10% Shield Pierce
+70 Crystal Power

(Helps your abilities deal more damage, especially against enemies with high shield.)

+25% Cooldown Speed
+2.5 Energy Recharge

(Cooldown acceleration increases the speed at which your abilities come off the timer.)

Passive: Amplify Crystal Power by 30%

+40% Cooldown Speed
+250 Max Energy

(Cooldown Speed increases the speed at which your abilities come off the timer.)

+75 Armor
+30 Shield

+350 Health

+3 Energy Recharge

(Crystal power increases the strength of abilities.)

Consume: Temporarily gain 20-60 crystal power, 12%-36% cooldown acceleration, and 10-30 armor & shield based on your level. Lasts 2.5 minutes.
